Articles.Content:
Hi! This time I've create something monstrous... Yes ladies and gentlemans, the fantastic XB-70 LAGkyr... Ehm Valkyrie:cool:

This is really a monstrousity of parts, not so much clipping, just a lot of struts connectors for keeping all togeter, this thing is enormous!

Probably the biggest plane i had ever made.

Don't expect great look like the YF-12A (which is my best plane so far), but is still good looking even if it was really hard to create.

It counts about 400 parts, so EXPECT LAGS, i suggest to turn off the air effects.

Best thing of all, it has almost the same performance of the original plane: about 1000 m/s max speed and 22-23k m of altitude.

It isn't very rigid because it is big but is very stable, plus is able to land with no problem.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

DOWNLOAD

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/edit/?id=56084

IM OPEN FOR SUGGESTIONS, this is a really big plane so if u have some ideas to make him work better please tell me =)

Edited January 31, 2014 by eorin

Nice! Can you do the Tupolev TU-144?

16 built. 2 crashed. Only 102 total commercial flights with only 55 of those being passenger flights, the rest were cargo only. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tupolev_Tu-144
